intro: Dendrosenecio cheranganiensis subsp. dalei, commonly known as the Cherangani's tree heath, is a flowering plant native to Kenya. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its woody stems and dense foliage. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in clusters, typical of the genus Dendrosenecio. It thrives in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to arid conditions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and vulnerable species.
